mapper.insert: insert into user_tb ( username, email, user_birth, phone, display_nickname, user_profile_img_url, created_dt ) values ( #{username}, #{email}, #{userBirth}, #{phone}, #{displayNickname}, #{userProfileImgUrl}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select concat( (select word as adjective_word from nickname_words_tb where word_type = 'adjective' order by rand() limit 0, 1), (select word as noun_word from nickname_words_tb where word_type = 'noun' order by rand() limit 0, 1)) as nickname;
select COUNT(*) from oauth2_user_tb where provider = #{provider} and provider_id = #{providerId}
